mapper.insert: insert into hms_comment(member_id, board_id, cmt_content, writer_email) values(#{writerNo}, #{boardNo}, #{commentContent}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.cmt_content, m.email, m.member_id, c.created_date FROM hms_comment c inner join hms_member m on c.member_id = m.member_id WHERE comment_id = #{no}
SELECT c.board_id, c.member_id, c.comment_id, c.writer_email, c.cmt_content, c.created_date FROM hms_comment c WHERE board_id = #{no}
